text: El Santo de la Espada (in English, The Saint of the Sword) is a 1970 Argentine biographical movie directed by Leopoldo Torre Nilsson and was based on the novel by Ricardo Rojas. It stars Alfredo Alcón, Evangelina Salazar, Lautaro Murúa, Ana María Picchio, Héctor Alterio, Héctor Pellegrini, Alfredo Iglesias, Hugo Arana. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:Argentine biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Leopoldo Torre Nilsson
title: El Santo de la Espada
